name: MDLMeshBufferType
desc: Options for the content of a mesh buffer, used by the type property and by MDLMeshBufferAllocator methods for creating buffers.

items.name: case vertex
items.desc: The buffer contains per-vertex data for one or more vertex attributes of a MDLMesh object.

items.name: case index
items.desc: The buffer contains index data for a MDLSubmesh object.
